ULTRApipe Documentation
====================================

ultrapipe is a software library supporting the ULTRASAT mission. Currently, the repository is hosted on `Github <https://github.com/AstroMusers/ultrapipe/>`_. 
Currently in development.

Contents
--------

.. toctree::

   api
